ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The iOS/macOS Data Analysis team analyzes and produces insights from diagnostic and usage data from iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Macintosh systems. Our data is used to improve Apple products and services and to inform the strategic direction of our products. We are looking for talented Web Developers to build applications to aggregate and visualize our data.

ul.li: Strong skills in backend development and REST APIs
Extensive working experience in Ruby on Rails programming
Experience with databases such as MySQL, Postgres, Oracle

div.p: You will work across the organization to understand requirements and build out high value, interactive web applications. Working with our Data Scientists and Big Data Engineers, you will develop new ways to visualize and interact with data extracted from our large Hadoop clusters. Your work will have visibility across all levels of the Apple software engineering organization. If you are interested in working in a fast paced environment in collaboration with top engineering talent, we would like to talk to you.

Our team owns the full stack development of applications. So knowledge of front end technologies is a plus.
• Ability to design data models • Knowledge of client side technologies such as Javascript, CSS and HTML
